price: Por certo, removeremos por um pouco, o castigo, mas por certo, à descrença voltareis.
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
